de.esoco.lib.io

Class LimitedReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.FilterReader
        • de.esoco.lib.io.LimitedReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class LimitedReader
extends java.io.FilterReader
    A wrapper for Reader instances that limits the number of characters that can be read from it. It limits all (and only) characters read from the stream, even if the FilterReader.mark(int) and FilterReader.reset() methods are used. Characters ignored by invoking the FilterReader.skip(long) method will not count against the limit.

    If the limit is exceeded any further attempt at reading will throw a StreamLimitException. The remaining limit can be queried with the getRemainingLimit() method.
